introduction: Su-Hee's father is a fighter for the Independence who is betrayed and murdered by his right-hand man Joo. Joo deprives even her mother and controls back alleys in Hong Kong. Su-Hee is brought up by a British couple and becomes the second leader of an international gang. She makes a plan smuggle 100 million dollar's worth of items from Korea and removed her rival Joo without knowing her father's past. A Korean inspector Park chases her and smashes her plot into pieces. Su-He sheds bitter tears in remorse hearing about her family's tragic story from Park
